name: qiankun-micro-frontend-demo
description: Qiankun micro frontend demo with Vue2

scripts.install:all: npm run install:main && npm run install:child1 && npm run install:child2
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:main" "npm run start:child1" "npm run start:child2"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:main && npm run build:child1 && npm run build:child2
